mapper.select: SELECT r.id id, r.mchn_no mchnNo, r.trade_type tradeType, r.repay_type repayType, r.mchn_url mchnUrl, r.repay_className repayClassName, r.create_time createTime r.chnKeyEndDate, r.modify_time modifyTime, FROM t_gq_fss_mchn_repayconfig r

SELECT r.id id, r.mchn_no mchnNo, r.trade_type tradeType, r.repay_type repayType, r.mchn_url mchnUrl, r.repay_className repayClassName, r.create_time createTime r.chnKeyEndDate, r.modify_time modifyTime, FROM t_gq_fss_mchn_repayconfig r WHERE t.id = #{id }
